synopsis.text: Cartoon Network Japan unveiled a delightful anime adaptation of the timeless classic, Tom and Jerry, to commemorate 'Cheese Day' on November 11. This fresh take intertwines the iconic fast-paced humor with an adorable, modern 'pop' aesthetic. Fans will be thrilled to see the return of the beloved diaper-clad Tuffy Mouse, a familiar face from the original series, joining the duo in their new adventures. (Source: Crunchyroll)
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
